}} 'Play' is the fourth album released by Doug E. Fresh. It was released on
September 26, 1995, on Gee Street Independent and featured production from Doug
E. Fresh, Frankie Cutlass, and Todd Terry. The album itself was not a commercial
success, only peaking at #81 on the Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums, but several
singlesâ"Where's da Party At?" "Freaks," "Hands in the Air," and "I-ight"âall
made it to the Hot Rap Singles chart.
